alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Comal (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 02 at 3:29AM CST until March 02 at 3:45AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM CST FOR NORTHEASTERN BEXAR AND CENTRAL COMAL COUNTIES... At 329 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Smithson Valley, or 8 miles southwest of Canyon Lake Dam, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... New Braunfels, Canyon Lake Dam, Canyon Lake, Bulverde, Spring Branch, Smithson Valley, Fischer, Guadalupe River State Park, Timberwood Park, Startzville, Sattler and Honey Creek State Natural Area. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
